TopicTitle: Flapping Wings and Falling on My Face to Death (footage)

Articles.Content:
I have recently discovered and come to love KSP.

Here are two videos I made to profess my love.

This is KSP: The Unborn Foetuses Edition

http://youtu.be/xMayttTBzpE

This is me going in orbit around the sun in the demo (so that everyone knows I\'m not a complete idiot. I did actually manage to crash into Mun once, so there :-X)

http://youtu.be/10H_tFhWeTk

Thanks to everyone who has been or is working on this game. You roxor every boxor in the universe.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
